abstract: The BDR-2 by Amex, a portable Blu-ray recorder, plays back all Blu-ray discs and even supports double-layer Blu-ray disc reading and writing, for storing up to 50 gigabytes on one disc.
snippet: The BDR-2 by Amex, a portable Blu-ray recorder, plays back all Blu-ray discs and even supports double-layer Blu-ray disc reading and writing, for storing up to 50 gigabytes on one disc.
lead_paragraph: The high-definition format wars are over, but if all that corporate combat got you excited for Blu-ray HD DVDs, you’ll be pleased to see the relatively low-cost BDR-2 by Amex, a $389 portable Blu-ray recorder for Macs and PCs.

headline.main: Now You Can Burn Your Own Blu-ray HD Discs, on Mac or PC, for Less Money
headline.print_headline: Now You Can Burn Your Own Blu-ray HD Discs, on Mac or PC, for Less Money
